modName: Tale of the Tongues Orchestral - Main Menu Music
summary: Replaces the main menu music with an orchestral rendition of Tale of the Tongues.
descriptionHtml:
[b]The O.V. Orchestra presents...[/b]

[center][youtube]8kFn8TcEzig[/youtube][/center]

Replaces the main menu music with my orchestral version of \'Tale of the Tongues\', featuring the vocal talents of Mikael, Bard of Whiterun.

Installation: Simply extract into your data folder. Alternatively, use Nexus Mod Manager.
author: OminousVoice

files.name: Tale of the Tongues Orchestral - Main Menu Music
